reviewText:
We returned the Item, not knowing what "Coded" was all about,  We did not have the right equipment.
But they were very good in giving a refund
that movie don't work on are vcr here in Canada  it a great movie I would love to have it  when you have it that work on are vcr let me know and I by it  please and thank you
Great movie at a great price!

Was not happy with this DVD it was in German which was not stated on the web site and it would cost more in postage to send it back than the cost of the DVD in the first place as I'm in Australia as far as I'm concern it was false advertising

I have been wanting this dvd forever. I knew it would be in German. I do not understand German but figured I could get by with the subtitles. There are no subtitles. Although I love the dvd-the dvd features stink. Buyer beware.
I am one of those that loves real action movies, especially ones involving natural disasters. If you are a lover or natural disasters, rent or buy this movie.

Hard to know if this is a good movie or not since I failed to note the Region 2 (actually I was unaware at the time of the different region classifications for dvd's).  It won't pay in Region 1 which is USA.
